name: Baby Posh Pad
description:
Baby posing bean bag made of sturdy vinyl fabric which can be easily wiped off and cleaned. Stitched with heavy duty upholstery thread and seals with a velcro closure. Includes small strap for easy transportation.

Dimensions are approximately 40" in diameter by 15" tall.

*DOES NOT COME WITH FILL*

You decide the level of fullness you want your bag by how many beans you fill it with.

You can purchase the beans at Wal-Mart, Meijer and K-Mart.

I recommend about 4 bags of beans to fill the bag.

This posing bean bag mainly used for newborn posing, can also be used for older babies and children due to its large size.


*If you would like to order a posh pad in another color other than white, please contact me and we can discuss.*

Find us on Facebook www.facebook.com/perfectlyposh1

Never leave babies unattended on the baby posh pad.
The baby posh pad is designed for photography purposes and not as a bed or other furniture.

Please keep baby posh pad away from sharp objects so as to not puncture or tear.

PLEASE ALLOW 1-2 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY.

Find us on Facebook!  
www.facebook.com/perfectlyposh1
